SEARCH
Package ca.jolt.cookie

Class CookieBuilder

java.lang.Object
ca.jolt.cookie.CookieBuilder
public final class CookieBuilder extends Object
Builds and adds Cookie objects to an HttpServletResponse.

This class follows the builder pattern, allowing a series of configuration calls before invoking build() to finalize the cookie and attach it to the response.

Example Usage: 


 HttpServletResponse response = ...;
 new CookieBuilder(response)
     .setName("sessionId")
     .setValue("abc123")
     .httpOnly(true)
     .secure(true)
     .maxAge(3600)
     .path("/")
     .sameSite("Strict")
     .build();

If the cookie name is absent or empty, IllegalStateException is thrown when build() is called.

Since:
1.0
Author:
William
